title: Issues with connecting into games recently
body:
Does anyone else have issues with connecting into games recently? Usually this results in me having to close the clieint and reopen up a new client before it lets me reconnect - and by the time I do that the game has already been remade. I've lost countless LP from this and have even been given a leaverbuster due to this.

Does anyone know why this happens? And how do I fix this?

replies.body:
Could you do the following for me,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

on Reddit everyone is talking about this too. It has been reported in Jan 2017 but maybe you could report it to RIOT again. Try this bug report thread and use the Tag : [CLIENT] [] (http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)
